snippet: A historian disputes the claim that a drawing said to be an early design study for the Riviera was prepared before the car was produced.
abstract: A historian disputes the claim that a drawing said to be an early design study for the Riviera was prepared before the car was produced.

headline.main: Tracing the Murky Origins of a Buick Riviera Sketch
